articles.title: Madeleine McCann search focuses on Portugal reservoir, 16 years on - Reuters
articles.description: Police investigating the disappearance of British girl Madeleine McCann in 2007 searched in and around a reservoir in southern Portugal on Tuesday.
articles.content:
SILVES, Portugal, May 23 (Reuters) - Police investigating the disappearance of British girl Madeleine McCann in 2007 searched in and around a reservoir in southern Portugal on Tuesday.
